mapper.select: select ori.id as oriId, ori.name_en as oriName, std.id as modelId, std.name_en as modelName, std.conv_ds_conf_id as modelDsConfigId from conv_original_table ori left join std_original_model std on ori.model_id = std.id where ori.name_en ilike #{oriTableName} and ori.sys_code = #{sysCode};
